original_text: Some Pharisees saw what was happening. They said to Jesus' disciples, ‘Your teacher is eating a meal with these bad people. That is not right. They are people who do not obey God, and some of them take taxes from people.’
korean_text: 바리새인들이 보고 그의 제자들에게 이르되 어찌하여 너희 선생은 세리와 죄인들과 함께 잡수시느냐

sentences.original_text: Some Pharisees saw what was happening
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 바리새인들이 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는지 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: Your teacher is eating a meal with these bad people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들의 선생님이 이 나쁜 사람들과 함께 식사하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They are people who do not obey God
and some of them take taxes from people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 중 일부는 사람들에게 세금을 걷습니다
